name: TFlickrDownloader
tagline: flickr album, photostream and set downloader
body:
# TFlickrDownloader
A tool to download photostreams, albums and sets from flickr. Download several pages in parallel to improve overall download speed.

# Screenshot
![Main form](http://i.imgur.com/eVNZ0rM.png)

# Binaries
You can get setups from two different locations:

[sourceforge](https://sourceforge.net/projects/tphotodownloader/)

[codeplex](https://tflickrdownloader.codeplex.com/)
